FROM

        BULK 'https://wendydlstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/wdlsfilename/silver/P6523_Verbruiken_DM_GEMEENTE_202208.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
